          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Barn har rätt</string>
            <string language="en">Children have the right</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinder haben das Recht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les enfants ont le droit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As crianças têm a direita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I bambini hanno la destra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα παιδιά έχουν το δικαίωμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los niños tienen la derecha</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">En liten övning om barns rättigheter i samhället.Modul 5 - Vem är du? - Extra 5.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">A small exercise on children's rights in society. Module 5 - Who are you? - Extra 5. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">barns rättigheter</string>

            <string language="en">sfi</string>

            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">children's rights</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine kleine Übung auf Rechten der Kinder in der 
Gesellschaft. Modul 5 - Wer sind Sie? - Extra5. 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un petit exercice sur les juste des enfants dans 
la société. Module 5 - Qui êtes-vous ? - 5 
supplémentaires. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um exercício pequeno em direitas das crianças na
sociedade. Módulo 5 - Quem são você? - 5 extra. 
Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una piccola esercitazione sui diritti dei bambini 
nella società. Modulo 5 - Chi sono voi? - 5 
supplementari. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια μικρή άσκηση στα δικαιώματα των παιδιών στην 
κοινωνία. Ενότητα 5 - ποιοι είναι εσείς; - Επιπλέον 
5. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un ejercicio pequeño en las derechas de los 
niños en sociedad. Módulo 5 - ¿Quiénes son usted? 
- 5 adicionales. Safir.</string>
          </description>
